title: Will flexi-wing rule reshuffle F1? - What to look for at the Spanish GP
summary: The Spanish Grand Prix marks the end of F1â€™s second triple-header in a hectic start to 2025, with new flexi-wing regulations set to potentially disrupt the competitive order ahead of round nine

qa_pairs.question: What is the purpose of flexi-wing regulations in Formula 1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: To limit the aerodynamic flexibility of wings during races.
wrong_options: To increase the overall weight of the car.

qa_pairs.question: How many races are typically included in a triple-header in Formula 1?
Which event is mentioned as occurring at the end of F1's second triple-header in 2025?
